name: get-initiative-data
description: Cloud Function for Dialogflow CX Tool to retrieve initiative data

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy getInitiativeData --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1 --project insaight-backend --set-env-vars SUPABASE_URL=https://zkkdnslupqnpioltjpeu.supabase.co,SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=${SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY}
